alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:49PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Russell, Lincoln and Ellsworth Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Interstate 70 may see slippery conditions at times during the night along with blowing snow. The blowing snow may reduce visibilities as well.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Increase our following distance on roadways and allow extra time The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
